description:
Now that Kuro is living with Illya`s family, her "normal" life starts! One morning Kuro says she`s going to make a delicious pound cake for Shirou, and Illya quickly turns it into a competition. Soon it breaks out into a battle of deserts over their feelings for their older brother!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 激突! クッキン・シスターズ
